channel.title: FiliTico
channel.description: TheBeatMonger, hosted by FiliTico: Electronic Music invades College Radio featuring headliner interviews and DJ sets in Minimal Techno, Progressive and Psy Trance, Electro, House, Ambient.
channel.itunes:subtitle: TuneIn TurnOn or Dropout
channel.itunes:author: FiliTico
channel.itunes:summary: TheBeatMonger, hosted by FiliTico: Electronic Music invades College Radio featuring headliner interviews and DJ sets in Minimal Techno, Progressive and Psy Trance, Electro, House, Ambient.

item.title: MOVING MIXEN Chapter 11
item.description: I understand maintenance must be paid to keep this wonderful site going, but if you think I am going to pay podomatic 149.90 a year for less than 3 gigs storage space then i'm out of here! From now on all my mixes are available at http://www.filitico.com. moving on.. tune in turn on or drop out!
item.dc:creator: FiliTico
item.itunes:summary:
I understand maintenance must be paid to keep this wonderful site going, but if you think I am going to pay podomatic 149.90 a year for less than 3 gigs storage space then i'm out of here! From now on all my mixes are available at http://www.filitico.com.
moving on..
tune in turn on or drop out!

item.title: Digitigrade 4
item.description: Greetings earthlings, we are now taking over your radio with some pulled kosher pork. This is deep progressive and minimal. Playlist is available upon request as usual ;) Saludos a todos los oyentes en Guayaquil!
item.dc:creator: FiliTico
item.itunes:summary:
Greetings earthlings, we are now taking over your radio with some pulled kosher pork. This is deep progressive and minimal. Playlist is available upon request as usual ;)
Saludos a todos los oyentes en Guayaquil!

item.title: Filitico - Guayaquil Mix 2 - Minimal Lounge
item.description: Tune in Turn on or Drop out to a new Guayaquil Mix featuring a new style I have been developing since my return to the "Pearl of the Pacific." I guess you can say I have mellowed out a bunch since my psytrance days, but instead of heat there's spice; instead of energy there's groove. 75 minutes of Minimal Lounge... playlist: 1. Robert Babicz - humble [Systematic] 2. DJ Koze - i want to sleep [International Records] 3. Umek - complex puzzle (masque remix) [Proton Music] 4. Frank Lorber, Bernd Maus, Erik Besier - tres [Alphabet City] 5. Dinky - mars cello [Vakant] 6. Dyed Soundorom - tapioka (seuil new york rehouse mix) [Tsuba] 7. Kalabrese - auf dem hof (ludron dub) [Stattmusik] 8. H.O.S.H. - super sick bowl [Diynamic] 9. Seuil - trapped house [Freak N Chic] 10.MyMy - Everybody's Talkin [Playhouse] 11.Minimono - Ratman (Hugo Remix) [Tuning Spork] 12.Matthias Tanzmann - Redirected [Moon Harbour] 13.Stimming - Liberaos [Diynamic] 14.Sweet N Candy - what is he talking about (hedges and beaner gefickt remix) [District of Corruption] 15.Mirweis Sangin - euphemism [District of Corruption] 16.Italoboyz - Viktor Casanova (Samim Remix) [Mothership] 17.Kreon & Lemos - lyly's here (anthony collins rmx) [Resopal Red] 18.Daniel Mehlhart - redrum_society [Get Physical Music] 19.Solead - lili feat guet (shadi megallaa's mind body and soul remix) [Tree Hand Music]

item.title: FiliTico: Fullon Morning PsyTrance
item.description: I introduce to you a selection of power mongering melodic psytrance beats by artists such as Tetrameth, Chromosome, Terraformers, Genetic Spin and Soul Surfer. I recorded this mix at Florida Atlantic University's Owl Radio. Check out the l3log for more mixes, music reviews, and videos at: http://thebeatmonger.blogspot.com TuneIn TurnOn or DropOut! tracklist: http://thebeatmonger.blogspot.com/2007/04/filitico-owl-radio-mix-el-otro-soy-yo_05.html
item.dc:creator: FiliTico
item.itunes:summary:
I introduce to you a selection of power mongering melodic psytrance beats by artists such as Tetrameth, Chromosome, Terraformers, Genetic Spin and Soul Surfer.
I recorded this mix at Florida Atlantic University's Owl Radio. Check out the l3log for more mixes, music reviews, and videos at: http://thebeatmonger.blogspot.com
TuneIn TurnOn or DropOut!

item.title: FiliTico: Guayaquil Mix 1 (estropeado demo mix)
item.description: I'm in Ecuador for a couple months kikn it with the local scene. I will post some of their mixes here as well. This is my first of a new series. playlist available upon request ;) --- update: this mix was used in the Estropeado concert in G-city.

item.itunes:summary:
I'm in Ecuador for a couple months kikn it with the local scene. I will post some of their mixes here as well. This is my first of a new series.

item.title: Return of TheBeatMongers
item.description: After two years of being Beat Monger AWOL, Spectra returns to Owl Radio @ FAU to graduate and of course, MC one last show before going back to the army. FiliTico hits the decks with some deep minimal and then driving up the tempo hypnotic squelchy tech-house and topping it off with a good'ol pounding. You're listening to Owl Radio, tuning into that which surrounds you, which is both within you and without you. ;) check out the 13LOG @ http://thebeatmonger.blogspot.com tracklist: 1. Lutzenkirchen - Paperboy [Great Stuff] 2. Stimming - Liberaos [Diynamic] 3. Matthias Tanzmann - Redirected [Moon Harbour] 4. Beckers, D-Nox - Shanghigh (Minilogue Remix) [Electribe] 5. Greed, Sonic Cube - Wilde (Elegant Universe Remix) [Tribal Vision] 6. Roger Martinez, Funkuz - Instigate [In Charge] 7. Stephan Bodzin - Cucuma [Herzblut] 8. Perfect Stranger, Pena - Ode Ao Sol (Moonbeam Remix) [BEEF] 9. Maelstrom - Chapster (Perfect Stranger Remix) [Iboga] 10. Reshuffle - Hedonism [Supplement Facts] 11. Applescal - Lost In Paris [Manual Music] 12. Mauro Picotto - Flashing [Alchemy Italy] 13. Lutzenkirchen - Paperboy (D Nox & Beckers Remix) [Great Stuff] 14. Len Faki - My Black Sheep (L B Dub Corp Remix) [Figure] 15. Len Faki - Odyssee 2 [Podium]
item.dc:creator: FiliTico
item.itunes:summary:
After two years of being Beat Monger AWOL, Spectra returns to Owl Radio @ FAU to graduate and of course, MC one last show before going back to the army.
FiliTico hits the decks with some deep minimal and then driving up the tempo hypnotic squelchy tech-house and topping it off with a good'ol pounding.
You're listening to Owl Radio, tuning into that which surrounds you, which is both within you and without you. ;)
check out the 13LOG @ http://thebeatmonger.blogspot.com
tracklist: 1. Lutzenkirchen - Paperboy [Great Stuff] 2. Stimming - Liberaos [Diynamic] 3. Matthias Tanzmann - Redirected [Moon Harbour] 4. Beckers, D-Nox - Shanghigh (Minilogue Remix) [Electribe] 5. Applescal - Lost In Paris [Manual Music] 12. Mauro Picotto - Flashing [Alchemy Italy] 13. Lutzenkirchen - Paperboy (D Nox & Beckers Remix) [Great Stuff] 14. Len Faki - My Black Sheep (L B Dub Corp Remix) [Figure] 15. Len Faki - Odyssee 2 [Podium]
